tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE nanoparticles_drug_delivery (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    size FLOAT,
    surface_area FLOAT,
    effectiveness_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE nano_particles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    size DECIMAL(10, 2),
    effectiveness DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE drug_delivery_systems (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    method VARCHAR(50),
    result VARCHAR(100),
    nanoparticles_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (nanoparticles_id) REFERENCES nano_particles(id)
);

CREATE TABLE NanoParticleStudy (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  nanoparticle_name TEXT,
  concentration FLOAT,
  effectiveness FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE DrugDeliverySystem (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  system_name TEXT,
  release_time FLOAT,
  efficiency FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE StudyResults (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  study_id INT,
  nanoparticle_id INT,
  system_id INT,
  result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE nanoparticles (
  np_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  np_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  np_size FLOAT NOT NULL,
  np_surface_area FLOAT NOT NULL,
  target_drug VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE drug_delivery_systems (
  dds_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  dds_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  dds_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dds_performance_score FLOAT,
  dds_implementation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE experimental_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  np_id INT,
  dds_id INT,
  test_date DATE,
  efficacy_score FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (np_id) REFERENCES nanoparticles(np_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (dds_id) REFERENCES drug_delivery_systems(dds_id)
);

CREATE TABLE researchers (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  researcher_specialization VARCHAR(100),
  affiliation VARCHAR(255),
  contact_email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE nanoparticles (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    particle_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    size SMALLINT,
    concentration DECIMAL,
    effectiveness DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE drugs (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    type VARCHAR(50),
    dosage DECIMAL,
    side_effects TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE delivery_system (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    technology VARCHAR(50),
    capacity DECIMAL,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    date DATE,
    duration SMALLINT,
    result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE results (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT,
    particle_id INT,
    drug_id INT,
    delivery_system_id INT,
    outcome TEXT
);
